nodes.text: The Nikardun Destiny was an empire of the Nikardun species located inside the Unknown Regions of the galaxy. The Destiny was led by General Yiv the Benevolent from his throne room aboard the Nikardun Battle Dreadnought Deathless. The empire included both subjugated and allied powers.

At the time of the Clone Wars, the Nikardun Destiny had began to invade a region of the Unknown Regions. Orchestrated by General Yiv, led the Nikardun conquests in an attempt to conquer various societies of the Chaos, successfully subjugating or otherwise making allies of several species. These campaigns eventually draw the attention of Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo of the Chiss Ascendancy.

After several encounters between the Destiny and Chiss Ascendancy, the Chiss were able to defeat the Nikardun Destiny in a final battle near the Vak homeworld of Primea with the aid of the Vak Combine, and captured Yiv, who became a prisoner of the Chiss Ascendancy. Following the general's disappearance, the Nikardun conquests fell apart, with no successor able to repair the damage the Ascendancy had done to their campaign.

The Destiny held a formidable fleet, using blockade frigates, destroyers, patrol craft, and various gunboats and missile boats. The Deathless acted as the mobile capital, and was a Battle Dreadnought class. Nikardun soldiers acted as security guards for the Destiny.

The Nikardun Destiny was an empire located in the Unknown Regions of the galaxy, where it had a great deal of influence and control. Various subjugated governments fell under it yoke, such as the Lioaoin Regime, Tower Dimension, and the Hiveborn
